name: FakeValuesService_addUrlTest
description: Unit tests for the addUrl method in FakeValuesService, covering valid and invalid scenarios.

test_cases.name: testAddUrlValid
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of a valid URL to the FakeValuesService.

test_cases.name: testAddUrlNullLocale
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of the addUrl method when the locale is null, expecting a NullPointerException.

test_cases.name: testAddUrlNullUrl
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of the addUrl method when the URL is null, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.

test_cases.name: testAddUrlInvalidUrl
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of the addUrl method when an invalid URL is provided, expecting a MalformedURLException.
